title: What salaries are paid to the employees of the local Mental Health offices?  Does your study have VA and DSS salary information listed?
text:
Salaries of New Hanover County employees, including DSS, are in our
database. Currently, we're having some problems with online access to
the database because we're switching over to some new software and
we're still trying to work out some bugs, but the database should be
back online soon.
